'''Nijikon''' (Japanese：'''二次元コンプレックス'''）which is generally known as '''Nijigen Complex'''，is a psychological phenomenon that a person has sexual desire for virtual characters in animes and mangas, but have no interest in the opposite sex in reality.

This phenomenon was appeared in  Japan in 1980s. That time,many Japanese senior middle school students were so addicted to comics that they didn't communicate with people in reality.Especially in the Lost Decate,these people,who were so-called [[OTAKU]]<nowiki/>s,wanted to eascape from the pressure in reality,and wanted to get comfort from virtual world.Some of the OTAKUs even wanted to get marry with the characters in animes and mangas. This is called "Nijigen Complex".
